text:
e="preserve">Jagannath Mishra (24 June 1937 – 19 August 2019) was an Indian politician. He was the Chief Minister of Bihar from 1975 to 1977, again from 1980 to 1983 and for a final time from 1989 to 1990. Mishra was born in Bihar. He was a member of the Indian National Congress.
Mishra died on 19 August 2019 at a hospital in New Delhi of cancer at the age of 82.
